mapper.insert: INSERT INTO J_EMPLOYMENT (JOBNO, STARTDATE, PROCDATE, EMPTYPE, EMPLOYER, SALARY, JOBROLE, INCENTIVE, JOBCAT, MEMO, OTHERS) VALUES ( #{employmentJobNo}, #{employmentStartDate}, #{employmentProcDate}, #{employmentEmpType}, #{employmentLoyer}, #{employmentSalary}, #{employmentJobRole}, #{employmentIncentive}, #{employmentJobcat}, #{employmentMemo}, #{employmentOthers} )
